title: MY GOODBEYE LETTER TO THE LEAGUE AND RIOT
body: Well this is my goodbye letter to riot and league of legends. i hope you enjoy your community full of ban happy, pampered pre teens. i hope you enjoy the loss of real competitors in your community due to stupid in game changes and policy changes. i hope you enjoy the money you received from me for the skins ive purchased. i hope you enjoyed the 6 years of game play and loyalty ive had to your game. i enjoyed some of the times ive had playing league. like when im with my friends, but none of them play anymore due to your stupid changes and im soon to follow. i hope you enjoy no one in your games talking about anything soon bc their fear of getting banned. i hope you enjoyed making a Blizzard Entertainment rip off game. despite what most rioters will say your ranking/elo system is trash and i may have been able to avoid the bad situations ive encountered on here had i been placed in a proper rank and elo. constantly get placed in games with players who have no idea how champions work and cant play certain roles. after 6 years im still placed with these people. i know the mechanics of every champ in league (not good at all of them obviously) and usually making winning plays on my team even after losing lane. but i get paired with people who intentionally feed and are toxic instead of getting paired with higher rank players who actually care about doing well and getting better. unfortunately i was never able to get my rank up high enough to ever get paired with a team full of positive, competitive players and i was stuck in the low life trash elo/ranks... . about as high as silver 1 since i didnt have the time to play ranked often enough to climb from bronze 5 where i get started every season. either way. good bye. good riddance. find a better way to separate the casual players from the people who actually want to compete. im sad to go but it just isnt the place for me to have fun anymore. ill stick around for some replies. after this thread dies im outy 5000.
